group_1.textLeft: Oh, welcome!@Here to enhance your powers again?

Wow, [chara:101700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]you have so many!@[chara:101700:lipSynch_0][freeze:1][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]You're so dedicated.

group_1.textRight: â€¦That's because I want to get stronger.@If I get stronger...
Maybe I'll find something that will lift@me out of the boredom of daily life.

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm...@[chara:101700:lipSynch_0][freeze:1][chara:101700:motion_200][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]Well. In my opinion...
...It'd be nice if you could get yourself@excited about something like this.
Yes! The peak of summer fun! You should@be enjoying stuff like this at your age.

group_1.textRight: Why do you have something @like that here?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, someone must have forgotten it here.
Anyway, I figured some of my customers@might be interested, so...
I left it out.
So, what do you think?@Are you interested?
Geeze!@You're always so level headed.
...Well then, shall we begin?
Okay, all done.@[chara:101700:lipSynch_0][freeze:1.0][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_051.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]I did a lot at once, so...
It might take a little while for you to@get used to the changes.
Oh, [chara:101700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]I just remembered!
Kokoro!
Err, what was her last name again?@Aname? Amame?
Oh yeah! That's it!@[chara:101700:lipSynch_0][freeze:1.5][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]...Hey!
I was trying to be funny.@You didn't even crack a smile.
Geeze!@You're as cool as a cucumber!
...Now, where was I?@Ah yes, that girl, Kokoro!
You're pretty close friends, right?
She said, something like, "Masara and I@defeated a Witch together yesterday."
She was in here the other day@and told me about it.
Oh, is that right?@But, up until now...
You always fought Witches alone, right?

group_1.textRight: She just insisted that she @wanted to fight alongside me...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, what's this?@A one-sided relationship?
Well, that's kinda nice, isn't it?@I mean...
I bet you're happy to know that@someone feels that way about you.

group_1.textRight: I find her expectations very annoying.

group_1.textLeft: Expectations?@What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: Spending time with me like that...
There's nothing in it for her...
Despite that, she says@she wants to be with me...
That's too heavy of a burden.

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm...@...Well...
If there is someone who knows@why she wants to be with you...
That someone is Kokoro.
You mentioned that her feelings are@a heavy burden...
That doesn't sound like the cool, @cold Masara that I know, does it?
Well...@If you think she's just annoying...
You wouldn't care whether or not there was@any benefit for her...
You could just ditch her, but you don't.
I bet the real reason you don't do that is...
Maybe there's@a tiny, little part of you...
That wants to live up to her expectations.

group_1.textRight: I don't care what that girl@wants from me at all.

group_1.textLeft: Oh...@Now that's the Masara I know.
